title: Install Visual Studio Code on Windows, macOS, and Linux
excerpt: Step-by-step VS Code install with extensions, Git integration, and shell setup.
content:
1) Download VS Code from the official site.
2) Enable shell integration during install.
3) Install key extensions: GitLens, ESLint, Prettier.
4) Set the default formatter to Prettier and enable format on save.
5) Configure integrated Git and sync settings.

title: Set up Git and GitHub with SSH
excerpt: Generate SSH keys, add them to GitHub, and verify secure pushes.
content:
1) Generate a new SSH key: ssh-keygen -t ed25519 -C "you@example.com".
2) Add the public key to GitHub: Settings â†’ SSH and GPG keys.
3) Test with: ssh -T git@github.com.
4) Configure Git username/email and default branch: git config --global init.defaultBranch main.
5) Clone via SSH and push a test commit.

title: Install Python 3 and pip on Windows
excerpt: Clean Python install with PATH setup, pip, and venv for isolated projects.
content:
1) Download Python 3 from python.org; tick "Add Python to PATH".
2) Verify: python --version, pip --version.
3) Create a virtual env: python -m venv .venv; activate: .venv\Scripts\activate.
4) Upgrade pip: python -m pip install --upgrade pip.
5) Install packages with requirements.txt and freeze with pip freeze > requirements.txt.
